Synopsys | Senior R&D Engineer | Marlboro, MA | ONSITE, www.synopsys.com

The ZeBu emulation team part of Verification Group is hiring a software engineer with a taste for complex challenges: scaling algorithms (we compile largest designs in the world), data-structures, heuristics, multi-threading. A bonus for some digital EE knowledge, but that's not a requirement (at all). Salary is one from a big EDA company (check Glassdoor), growth of the business unit opens up nice possibilities for personal career.

We are looking for someone with up to 5 years of experience.

Send your resume to elepercq@synopsys.com More info on ZeBu: https://www.synopsys.com/verification/emulation.html
